fulltext:
PHUONG, LE THI MAI
BUSINESS ANALYST (BA)
I have three years of experience: 2 years as a Business Analyst and 1 year as a Customer 
Specialist Advocate. I am known as an enthusiastic individual in my work. I am customer-oriented 
and goal-oriented in my daily job. Additionally, I am a team-player and I know the how to 
harmonize my opinions with others' and I am willing to listen to colleagues' ideas. 
My favorite quote is "Get busy living or get busy dying".
EDUCATION
Hanoi University 
October 2012 - June 2016
Faculty of Information and Technology 
( English base ) 
Km9 Nguyen Trai Street, Thanh Xuan, Hanoi
WORKING EXPERIENCE
FPT SOFTWARE
JUNE 2016 - JUNE 2017
17 Duy Tan, Cau Giay, Ha Noi
Project : 
Description : 
Customer: 
Team size:
Communication: 
Position:
DTL-TEMANDO 
Responsibility: 
An integration shipping platform for commerce Connecting carriers with 
retailers and retailers to people 
TEMANDO 
15 members ( 1 PM, 3 BA, 1 TL, 11 DEVs)
Vietnamese and English
Business Analyst
Requirements management and communication between Vietnam team 
and Temando team in Australia. 
Requirements analysis and organization  
Requirements translation and simplification. 
Planning and monitoring project's progress  
Carry out testing after developers have deployed; verify bugs (if any) and 
report to team and customers. 
WORKING EXPERIENCE
TEK EXPERTS
SEP 2017 - MAY 2018
54 Lieu Giai, Cong Vi, Ba Dinh, Ha Noi
Project : 
Description : 
Customer: 
Team size:
Communication: 
Position:
Dynamics 365 - CRM
Responsibility: 
CRM stands for customer relationship management. It's a category of 
integrated, data-driven software solutions that improve how you interact 
and do business with your customers. CRM systems help you manage and 
maintain customer relationships, track sales leads, marketing, and pipeline, 
and deliver actionable data. 
APAC ( users and enterprise) 
9 members ( 1 SME, 8 CSS)
English
Technical Support Engineer
Contact customers as the primary contact of the issues. 
Deliver advanced technical troubleshooting and solutions. 
Escalated to higher level of management if requested. 
Collaborate on cross-team technical issues. 
Manage critical issues by setting customer expectations, devise and 
implement action plans and professionally communicate to all parties 
involved. 
WORKING EXPERIENCE
LARION COMPUTING 
JUL 2018 - APR 2019
QTSC Bulidng 1, Quang Trung Software City, Ho Chi Minh
Project : 
Description : 
Customer: 
Team size:
Communication: 
Position:
MSS (Meperia Strategic Sourcing)
Responsibility: 
An integration healthcare system which provides control to the med-surg 
spend, this is also considered as the warehouse for hospitals.
Meperia
9 members ( 1SM, 1 BA, 2 QC, 5 DEV)
Vietnamese and English
Business Analyst
Receive tasks as Work Items ( Enhancement or Bugs fixing) from PO, then 
carry out initial Investigation and Analyst. 
Confirm requirements from Customer via meetings, then create 
requirement documents ( UI Prototype, BR, ML..). 
Hold meeting with team to distribute logic and requirements, also break 
down features of task so that Dev and QC can base on that to create detailed 
estimation. During development process, support team in clarifying 
requirement and investigating bugs. 
Review Test case for QC based on BA's view (logic only) 
Verify requirement of released WI. Sometimes, support QC in doing smoke 
test. 
Demonstrate of released WI for customers 
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Write and speak in quite fluent English. 
Able to translate complex text into easily 
readable material. 
Able to read and understand documents 
quickly with skimming and scanning skills. 
Beginner level with basic words, grammar 
and usage of the Spanish. 
Able to read and understand simple 
context and documents. 
OCCUPATION OBJECTIVES
To work in a modern, active, youthful and competitive environment, which provides 
me opportunities to work and explore the possibilities and potential of myself. English speaking 
environment is more preferred.  
To accumulate and learn a lot of knowledge, experiences and skills from this job 
To succeed in a stimulating and challenging environment; building the success of the company 
while I experience advancement opportunities. 
To have a suitable rewarding career where I can use my skills and knowledge to help the company 
and my co-worker be successful. 
KEY SKILLS
COMMUNICATION
CREATIVITY  
TEAMWORK
LANGUAGE
SELF-MOTIVATION
PRESSURE-HANDLING
